original_text: After Paul spoke this message, he and Barnabas were leaving the meeting place. The people there said to them, ‘Please return on our next day of rest. Then you can tell us more about what you have already told us.’
korean_text: 그들이 나갈새 사람들이 청하되 다음 안식일에도 이 말씀을 하라 하더라

sentences.original_text: he and Barnabas were leaving the meeting place
The people there said to them
Please return on our next day of rest
Then you can tell us more
sentences.korean_translation: 그러면 더 많은 것을 우리에게 말해줄 수 있습니다

sentences.original_text: about what you have already told us
